exceptions.summary: Thrown when the precision is less than zero.

parameters.name: precision
parameters.summary:
The precision of the duration type relative to 1 second. For example, millisecond
            precision = 0.001.

parameters.name: isNullable
parameters.summary: Whether the duration type can have a null value.
